blogPost.title: Is it necessary to have a PhD to become a good data scientist? Answer by Brad Klingenberg, VP of Algorithms @stitchfix. https://t.co/8myTKhfpqm https://t.co/sZhNqLxxuS
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 優れたデータサイエンティストになるためには、博士号が必要なのでしょうか？Answer by Brad Klingenberg, VP of Algorithms @stitchfix. https://t.co/8myTKhfpqm https://t.co/sZhNqLxxuS
要成为一名优秀的数据科学家，必须要有博士学位吗？回答者：Brad Klingenberg，算法副总裁 @stitchfix. https://t.co/8myTKhfpqm https://t.co/sZhNqLxxuS
要成爲一名優秀的數據科學家，必須要有博士學位嗎？回答者：Brad Klingenberg，算法副總裁 @stitchfix. https://t.co/8myTKhfpqm https://t.co/sZhNqLxxuS

previous.title: What are some common misconceptions people have about customer support chatbots? Answer by @dojiboy9, Co-Founder & CEO @forethought_ai. https://t.co/7jDe9QLFCn https://t.co/85dO4dU9Sy

localize.full_text: カスタマーサポート用チャットボットについて、よくある誤解とは？Answer by @dojiboy9, Co-Founder & CEO @forethought_ai. https://t.co/7jDe9QLFCn https://t.co/85dO4dU9Sy
人们对客户支持聊天机器人有哪些常见的误解？回答者：@dojiboy9，联合创始人& CEO @forethought_ai. https://t.co/7jDe9QLFCn https://t.co/85dO4dU9Sy
人們對客戶支持聊天機器人有哪些常見的誤解？回答者：@dojiboy9，聯合創始人& CEO @forethought_ai. https://t.co/7jDe9QLFCn https://t.co/85dO4dU9Sy

next.title: What are your best stress relieving tips for entrepreneurs? Answer by @KunalLunawat, GP & Co-founder at @AgyaVentures. https://t.co/y0Net8YB6t https://t.co/Q1s7jY6ev2

localize.full_text: 起業家におすすめのストレス解消法を教えてください。Answer by @KunalLunawat, GP & Co-founder at @AgyaVentures. https://t.co/y0Net8YB6t https://t.co/Q1s7jY6ev2
您对创业者有什么好的缓解压力的建议？回答者：@KunalLunawat，GP & @AgyaVentures的联合创始人。https://t.co/y0Net8YB6t https://t.co/Q1s7jY6ev2
您對創業者有什麼好的緩解壓力的建議？回答者：@KunalLunawat，GP & @AgyaVentures的聯合創始人。https://t.co/y0Net8YB6t https://t.co/Q1s7jY6ev2
